name: business-organization-list
description: Allows users to see organization list and edit/remove/add user to oraganization

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

tableSort.description: Provide an option to make table sortable

paginationItemPerPage.description: Provide ability to user to set display of number items per page

addUserButtonText.comment: Label of the button used to add a user.

firstNameLabelText.comment: Text display as label for first name textbox.

firstNameMaxLength.comment: Maximum number for character is allowed for first name.

lastNameLabelText.comment: Text display as label for last name textbox.

lastNameMaxLength.comment: Maximum number for character is allowed for last name.

emailAddressLabelText.comment: Text display as label for email address textbox.

spendingLimitLabelText.comment: Label for the spendingLimit input field

requiredFieldMissingSummaryError.value: A required field is missing. Please fill out all required fields and try again.

fieldIncorrectErrorText.value: One or more fields are filled out incorrectly. Please check your entries and try again.

actionErrorText.comment: Error message that shows when API fails.
actionErrorText.value: Sorry we are unable to perform that action at this moment, please try again later.

activeStatusText.comment: Text for to show that BusinessUser is active.

pendingStatusText.comment: Text for to show that BusinessUser is pending.

removedStatusText.comment: Text for to show that BusinessUser is disabled.

removeModalHeaderText.comment: Heading text for the Delete user pop up.

removeModalDescription.comment: Description text for the Delete user pop up.
removeModalDescription.value: Are you sure you want to remove the user from the organization user list?

viewModalHeaderText.comment: Heading text for the View User Details pop up.

emptyListMessage.comment: Text to show when there are no users in the organzization

loadingMessage.comment: Text to show while the users list is loading

errorGettingUsersMessage.comment: Text for the error message while getting users list
errorGettingUsersMessage.value: Sorry we are unable to load your organization at this moment, please try again later.

errorUpdatingUsersMessage.comment: Text for the error message while updating a user.
errorUpdatingUsersMessage.value: Sorry we are unable to edit/remove this user, please try again later.

allFieldsRequiredMessage.comment: Message to display when all input fields are required.
allFieldsRequiredMessage.value: *All Fields are required to add a user

tableNameHeadingText.comment: Text for the heading row of the Name column

tableEmailHeadingText.comment: Text for the heading row of the Email column

tableStatusHeadingText.comment: Text for the heading row of the Status column

tableSpendingLimitHeadingText.comment: Text for the heading row of the SpendingLimit column
